query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ai_vision_dashboard_configs` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`user_id` int NOT NULL,
	`layout_config` json,
	`widgets` json,
	`default_production_line_ids` json,
	`default_product_ids` json,
	`default_time_range` varchar(50) DEFAULT '24h',
	`auto_refresh` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	`refresh_interval` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 60,
	`cpk_warning_threshold` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 1.33,
	`cpk_critical_threshold` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 1.00,
	`ng_rate_warning_threshold` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 5.00,
	`ng_rate_critical_threshold` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 10.00,
	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	`updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
	INDEX `idx_ai_vision_dashboard_user` (`user_id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ai_vision_dashboard_configs` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`user_id` int NOT NULL,
	`layout_config` json,
	`widgets` json,
	`default_production_line_ids` json,
	`default_product_ids` json,
	`default_time_range` varchar(50) DEFAULT '24h',
	`auto_refresh` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	`refresh_interval` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 60,
	`cpk_warning_threshold` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 1.33,
	`cpk_critical_threshold` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 1.00,
	`ng_rate_warning_threshold` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 5.00,
	`ng_rate_critical_threshold` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 10.00,
	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	`updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
	INDEX `idx_ai_vision_dashboard_user` (`user_id`)
);
